currencyCode.description: The currency in which the invoice is issued.

grandTotal.description: The overall total amount of the invoice.

issueDate.description: The date the document was issued.

serviceDate.description: The date of service or transaction.

shipmentId.description: Starting with an "S" and followed by 6 or 7 digits. Example: S124321

deferredDutyPayer.description: It can be identified under "Aufschubenhmer" for each line item

name.description: The name or description of the line item A0000 and B0000

taxType.description: It's a line item mentioned in the invoice. For example; A0000 and B0000

totalAmount.description: The total amount for the line item.

totalAmountCurrency.description: The currency of the total amount.

vatId.description: The VAT identification number. This is named a Konto-Nummer for each line item.

dueDate.description: It's a due date. Due date to pay the amount. It's usually mentioned either in a date or a number of days format

invoiceNumber.description: Invoice Number is a unique identifier for the invoice, it starts with "ATC", "AT-C", or "AT/C" only (e.g., ATC40, AT-C-40-, AT/C/40/....). Do NOT extract "NIZZA-Registrierkennzeichen number.

items.description: The unique identifier for each container. It always starts with 4 capital letters and followed by 7 digits. Example: TEMU7972458.

creditNoteInvoiceNumber.description: The unique identifier for the associated Invoice. The number usually starts with ATS...
